channel.title: Movies on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in Movies on 2D Steve

item.title: Infinity War
item.description: I’ve been meaning to write something up regarding Infinity War for quite a while, but I just never got around to it.

item.title: My Wife Loves Me Pt 2
item.description: Last week, I wrote a post about how my wife loves me by hating me just enough to get me into the gym.

item.title: Iron Man Holds Up
item.description: Tonight, I watched Iron Man for the first time in a long time.

item.title: You Are My Friend
item.description: Mr. Rogers is a national treasure. To a lot of folks he may have just been a weird, quiet, old guy in a sweater who wanted to teach your kids about feelings.

item.title: Double Fine Adventure
item.description: I am such a ridiculously HUGE fan of Double Fine Adventure.

item.title: The Shape of Water
item.description: The Shape of Water is both one of the strangest movies I’ve ever seen and one of the most beautiful.

item.title: Man of Steel
item.description: THERE ARE SPOILERS FOR MAN OF STEEL IN THIS POST

item.title: Of Star Wars and Skyrim
item.description: I just realized that I have yet to write a blog post about what may very well be the most culturally significant announcement of this year.

item.title: Django Was Off The Chain!
item.description: So I just went to see Quentin Tarantino’s latest film and I have to say this BLEW MY MIND.

item.title: Memorial Day!
item.description: I have had probably the most uneventful Memorial Day weekend of my entire life, but at the same time a few really cool things did happen.

item.title: This Iron Giant Can't Be Beat
item.description: I am going to go into complete “Geek-Out” mode for this post and I apologize ahead of time for any kind of psycho rambling that i may go into.

item.title: Commitment
item.description: It’s been a long time since I’ve written anything of any kind in this blog and for that, I apologize.

item.title: Writing Bugs
item.description: I’ve got the writing bug again, although I have to admit that it’s not exactly for this blog.

item.title: Home Movies!
item.description: Yesterday I finally finished going through all the home movies that I have, and I actually found a few things that I had forgotten that I recorded.

item.title: Free Movie with Batman Trailer!
item.description: Holy Freakin' Awesome Trailer, Batman! I think I peed my pants at the theatre when I saw this thing.
